betterfoliage.global.enabled.tooltip: 如果關閉，BetterFoliage 不會渲染任何東西
betterfoliage.global.nVidia.tooltip: Specify whether you have an nVidia GPU
betterfoliage.hOffset.tooltip: 元素水平移動的距離，單位為方塊
betterfoliage.vOffset.tooltip: 元素垂直移動的距離，單位為方塊
betterfoliage.population.tooltip: 符合條件的方塊出現效果的機率（64分之N）
betterfoliage.shaderWind.tooltip: 將光影模組中的著色器應用於颳風效果？
betterfoliage.distance.tooltip: Maximum distance from player at which to render this feature
betterfoliage.blocks.tooltip: Configure lists of block classes that will have specific features applied to them
betterfoliage.blocks.dirtWhitelist.toolt: Blocks recognized as Dirt. Has an impact on Reeds, Algae, Connected Grass
betterfoliage.blocks.dirtBlacklist.toolt: Blocks never accepted as Dirt. Has an impact on Reeds, Algae, Connected Grass
betterfoliage.blocks.grassWhitelist.tool: Blocks recognized as Grass. Has an impact on Short Grass, Connected Grass
betterfoliage.blocks.grassBlacklist.tool: Blocks never accepted as Grass. Has an impact on Short Grass, Connected Grass
betterfoliage.blocks.grassModels.tooltip: Models and textures recognized for grass blocks
betterfoliage.blocks.leavesClassesWhitel: Blocks recognized as Leaves. Has an impact on Extra Leaves, Falling Leaves. Leaves will render with leaves block ID in shader programs
betterfoliage.blocks.leavesClassesBlackl: Blocks never accepted as Leaves. Has an impact on Extra Leaves, Falling Leaves. Leaves will render with leaves block ID in shader programs
betterfoliage.blocks.leavesModels.toolti: Models and textures recognized for leaves blocks
betterfoliage.blocks.cropsWhitelist.tool: Blocks recognized as crops. Crops will render with tallgrass block ID in shader programs
betterfoliage.blocks.cropsBlacklist.tool: Blocks never accepted as crops. Crops will render with tallgrass block ID in shader programs
betterfoliage.blocks.logClassesWhitelist: Blocks recognized as wooden logs. Has an impact on Rounded Logs
betterfoliage.blocks.logClassesBlacklist: Blocks never accepted as wooden logs. Has an impact on Rounded Logs
betterfoliage.blocks.logModels.tooltip: Models and textures recognized for wood log blocks
betterfoliage.blocks.sandWhitelist.toolt: Blocks recognized as Sand. Has an impact on Coral
betterfoliage.blocks.sandBlacklist.toolt: Blocks never accepted Sand. Has an impact on Coral
betterfoliage.blocks.lilypadWhitelist.to: Blocks recognized as Lilypad. Has an impact on Better Lilypad
betterfoliage.blocks.lilypadBlacklist.to: Blocks never accepted Lilypad. Has an impact on Better Lilypad
betterfoliage.blocks.cactusWhitelist.too: Blocks recognized as Cactus. Has an impact on Better Cactus
betterfoliage.blocks.cactusBlacklist.too: Blocks never accepted Cactus. Has an impact on Better Cactus
betterfoliage.blocks.myceliumWhitelist.t: Blocks recognized as Mycelium. Has an impact on Better Grass
betterfoliage.blocks.myceliumBlacklist.t: Blocks never accepted Mycelium. Has an impact on Better Grass
betterfoliage.blocks.netherrackWhitelist: Blocks recognized as Netherrack. Has an impact on Netherrack Vines
betterfoliage.blocks.netherrackBlacklist: Blocks never accepted Netherrack. Has an impact on Netherrack Vines
betterfoliage.shaders.leavesId.tooltip: 已將所有樹葉的ID意見回饋給光影。如果您的光影使用§6block.properties§e檔案，則可能需要修改該檔案以使其適配光影的映射。
betterfoliage.shaders.grassId.tooltip: Block ID reported to shader programs for all grasses and crops. If your shader uses a §6block.properties§e file, you'll probably need to change this to match the shader's mappings.
betterfoliage.leaves.tooltip: 額外的(超出方塊的)輪葉葉片塊
betterfoliage.leaves.dense.tooltip: 稠密模式會有更好的渲染效果（即更多環繞葉片）
betterfoliage.leaves.snowEnabled.tooltip: 是否啟用在雪中的額外葉片?
betterfoliage.leaves.hideInternal.toolti: Skip rendering extra leaves if leaf block is completely surrounded by other leaves or solid blocks
betterfoliage.shortGrass.tooltip: 一簇小草或者一叢菌絲土長在合適的方塊的頂部
betterfoliage.shortGrass.useGenerated: 使用方塊破壞產生的材質
betterfoliage.shortGrass.useGenerated.to: 從資源包中讀取的材質切片從而生成高草材質
betterfoliage.shortGrass.myceliumEnabled: 將這個特性利用到菌絲土中嗎?
betterfoliage.shortGrass.grassEnabled.to: 將這個特性利用到草地中嗎?
betterfoliage.shortGrass.snowEnabled.too: 使用到雪地裡的草地中去?
betterfoliage.shortGrass.saturationThres: Color saturation cutoff between "colorless" blocks (using biome color) and "colorful" blocks (using their own specific color)
betterfoliage.hangingGrass.tooltip: 草會在邊緣的草地上垂下來
betterfoliage.hangingGrass.separation.to: How much the hanging grass stands out from the block
betterfoliage.cactus.tooltip: 提高仙人掌的真實性以及額外的(超出方塊的)仙人掌刺和光滑的陰影
betterfoliage.cactus.sizeVariation.toolt: Amount of random variation on cactus size
betterfoliage.lilypad.tooltip: 提高蓮葉的真實性以及(在水中的)根和不定(生成)的花
betterfoliage.lilypad.flowerChance.toolt: Chance (N in 64) of a lilypad having a flower on it
betterfoliage.reed.tooltip: 蘆葦會生成在淺水中的泥土塊上
betterfoliage.reed.biomes.tooltip: 配置允許出現蘆葦的生態域
betterfoliage.reed.biomes.tooltip.elemen: Should reeds appear in the %s biome?
betterfoliage.algae.tooltip: 藻類會生成在深水中的泥土塊上
betterfoliage.algae.biomes.tooltip: 配置允許出現藻類的生態域
betterfoliage.algae.biomes.tooltip.eleme: Should algae appear in the %s biome?
betterfoliage.coral.tooltip: 珊瑚會生成在深水中的沙塊上
betterfoliage.coral.size.tooltip: 珊瑚伸出的部分的大小
betterfoliage.coral.biomes.tooltip: 配置允許出現珊瑚的生態域
betterfoliage.coral.biomes.tooltip.eleme: 珊瑚應該出現在%s生態域?
betterfoliage.coral.shallowWater.tooltip: Should coral appear in 1 block deep water?
betterfoliage.fallingLeaves.tooltip: 落葉粒子效果會從葉方塊塊底部下落
betterfoliage.fallingLeaves.windStrength: 在好天氣裡風的大小的效果(常態的傳播0為中心分布)
betterfoliage.fallingLeaves.stormStrengt: 附加的在陰雨天裡風的大小的效果(常態的傳播0為中心分布)
betterfoliage.fallingLeaves.chance.toolt: 每個(隨機的)機會做出記錄和進行碰撞葉塊從而產生一個粒子
betterfoliage.fallingLeaves.perturb.tool: 大小 增加了一個螺旋狀運動,粒子同步旋轉
betterfoliage.fallingLeaves.lifetime.too: 粒子的最長壽命僅在幾秒內,最短時間這個值60%%的值
Stop transparent blocks obscuring particles even when particle is in front. WARNING: may cause glitches.
betterfoliage.risingSoul.tooltip: 靈魂砂的頂部產生上升的靈魂粒子FX
betterfoliage.risingSoul.chance.tooltip: 每個靈魂砂隨機生成時產生一個粒子
betterfoliage.risingSoul.perturb.tooltip: 擾動效應的大小.增加了一個螺旋狀運動的粒子
betterfoliage.risingSoul.trailSize.toolt: 粒子的軌跡的初始大小
betterfoliage.risingSoul.sizeDecay.toolt: 靈魂痕跡粒子大小在先前的大小相關
betterfoliage.risingSoul.opacityDecay.to: 靈魂痕跡粒子不透明度與在先前的透明度相關
betterfoliage.risingSoul.lifetime.toolti: 粒子的最長壽命僅在幾秒內,最小值是這個值的60%%
betterfoliage.risingSoul.trailLength.too: 先前的數量定位於粒子重組記憶裡的紀錄
betterfoliage.risingSoul.trailDensity.to: Render every Nth previous position in the particle trail
betterfoliage.connectedGrass.enabled.too: If there is a grass block on top of a dirt block: draw grass top texture on all grass block sides,
betterfoliage.roundLogs.tooltip: Connect round blocks to solid full blocks?
betterfoliage.roundLogs.connectSolids.to: 要使木方塊呈圓形連接到完整方塊上嗎?
betterfoliage.roundLogs.connectPerpendic: 要使木方塊呈圓形連接到垂直圓木上嗎?
betterfoliage.roundLogs.lenientConnect.t: 在L形中也連接成巨大的圓木, 不只是2x2形
betterfoliage.roundLogs.connectGrass.too: 如果樹木下的泥土附近有草地,那麼它依然會變成草地
betterfoliage.roundLogs.radiusSmall.tool: 有多大的(體積)從圓木的外角砍掉
betterfoliage.roundLogs.radiusLarge.tool: 有多大的(體積)從連接著的巨大圓木的外角砍掉
betterfoliage.roundLogs.dimming.tooltip: 相當於加深被遮蓋的圓木面
betterfoliage.roundLogs.zProtection.tool: 相當於按比例讓少量圓木的連接平行 去停止 Z-fighting (閃爍)[斑駁,兩個多邊形共面所出現的效果].在沒有發生故障的情況下,試著將這個值設定得儘可能的高[這是Z-fighting出現的原因:多個多面體的麵重疊在一起,各個面的深度在buffer中是一樣的,出現了所謂z-fighting問題,造成圖形間遮蔽不正確]。
betterfoliage.roundLogs.defaultY.tooltip: 如果開啟, 圓木的方向不會確定而將會渲染成垂直的. 否則, 它們會渲染成立體方塊.
